## VectorBuilder.zeros() method

Constructs a vector of all zeros

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
zeros(dimension: number): V;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  dimension | number | The dimension of the vector to construct |

<b>Returns:</b>

V

The new vector

## Example


```
vectorBuilder.zeros(3); // [ 0 0 0 ]

```
